long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Session Saver is an easy to use extension that expands on the hotkey for opening a new window. While using the extension,
 a hotkey combination allows you to quickly close the current window while saving all its tabs as a new session that can be opened later. A new window will open in replacement and you will be off to browsing.
